titleStmt.title: A true and perfect relation of the great victory obtained over the Dutch with an account of the ships that was taken and sunk in the said engagement. Also, the names of their men of war, their commanders and number of their guns, that were appointed for a convoy to their Smyrna fleet.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, John, fl. 1672.

notesStmt.note: Heading on p. 7: From the Hague, March 29. S.N.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
